gt_text: 春季焕新大促 是时候焕新你的空间了。 清洁与家居用品最高优惠40% 为快乐腾出空间 含环保精选
juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements:

*   Title "春季焕新大促" in mint green bubble letters at the top
*   Small caption "是时候焕新你的空间了。" in light gray text above the title
*   Pink speech bubble below the title
*   Text "清洁与家居用品最高优惠40%" inside the pink speech bubble
*   Person joyfully opening a window
*   Sunlight streaming in
*   Shelf
*   Cleaning supplies on the shelf
*   Potted plants on the shelf
*   Folded towels on the shelf
*   Brand logo in the top right
*   Text "为快乐腾出空间" at the bottom
*   Text "含环保精选" at the bottom
*   Promo bar at the bottom
*   Discount code on the promo bar
